description: This source file implements functions related to advanced state access for a configuration parameter object, including getting, setting, testing, synchronizing, saving, and canceling parameter values. The functions handle data validation, conversions, and interactions with object controllers within a TR-069/CWMP-like framework.

methods.name: SLAP_VARIABLE * DslhVarroGetValue(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the current value of the parameter, with handling for persistent and default values, as well as direct object controller interaction, returning the value as a SLAP_VARIABLE.

methods.name: BOOL DslhVarroTstValue(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_VARIABLE * pNewValue)
methods.description: Tests whether a given parameter value is valid, performing data type validation, format checks, and boundary validation, including validation against content-type specific constraints.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhVarroSetValue(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_VARIABLE * pNewValue)
methods.description: Sets or updates the parameter value by converting and validating the input SLAP_VARIABLE based on content type and syntax, then calling the object controller's set method.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhVarroSynValue(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Synchronizes the current parameter value from the system into the in-memory cache or registry, preparing the parameter for operation or logging.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhVarroSaveOldValue(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Not implemented in the provided code; intended for saving the previous value before change.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhVarroCommitChange(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bFromAcs)
methods.description: Not implemented in the provided code; intended for committing a parameter change.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS DslhVarroCancelChange(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Not implemented in the provided code; intended for canceling a parameter change.

methods.name: DslhVarroSaveOldValue
methods.description: This function is called to save the current parameter value into OldParamValue, to allow for potential rollback or comparison.

methods.name: DslhVarroCommitChange
methods.description: This function commits a previous parameter change, including optional notification and persisting the value if necessary.

methods.name: DslhVarroCancelChange
methods.description: This function cancels a previous parameter change, freeing temporary variables and reverting state to pre-change conditions.
